issue.title: [Java] Remove APIs that have been deprecated for long
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13544](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13544). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For some APIs, it has been a long time since they were annotated deprecated. During this time, a number of releases have been published. So it is time to get rid of them.

Please also note that some APIs representing unsupported operations should not be annotated deprecated, unless the overriden APIs are deprecated in the super classes/interfaces.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13544?focusedCommentId=17408542) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10910
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10910>
